aka: The Makavejev Case or Trial in a Movie Theater

cast.name: 杜尚·马卡维耶夫 Dušan Makavejev

writer.name: 戈兰·拉多万诺维奇 Goran Radovanović

director.name: 戈兰·拉多万诺维奇 Goran Radovanović

this_title: Slučaj Makavejev ili proces u bioskopskoj sali
trans_title: 马卡维耶夫事件：影院里的审判
The Makavejev Case or Trial in a Movie Theater
introduction: The Makavejev Case or Trial in a Movie Theater explores the position of an artist in the Socialist FR Yugoslavia, focusing on the political and social climate that used public platforms to condemn the film WR: Mysteries of the Organism, under the auspices of the Communist Party.
chinese_title: 马卡维耶夫事件：影院里的审判
foreign_title: Slučaj Makavejev ili proces u bioskopskoj sali
